column2: they brought us a complimentary dessert- the fried milk that I noticed everybody raving about on Yelp.  I completely understand why though
column6: and unlike anything I've ever had before.  At this point we were both stuffed
column7: but basking in our respective food comas.  Eating a meal at Uchi is more than just eating a meal- it's an entire dining experience that starts when you walk in the door.  Save it for special occasions and go hungry!
